billhistory.caption: Relating to the automatic admission to general academic teaching institutions and eligibility for certain scholarships of a student who is the valedictorian of the student's high school graduating class.
billhistory.coauthors: Anderson, Charles "Doc" | Bernal | Burns | Burrows | Canales | Cyrier | Darby | Frank | King, Ken | Lambert | Landgraf | Martinez, "Mando" | Minjarez | Paul | Price | Rodriguez, Eddie | Smithee | VanDeaver | White
